macro_name PATHSCALE

binary_name pathCC

optimization_flags "-O3"

lang_flags "-D_REENTRANT -ansi -Wno-long-long"
warning_flags "-W -Wall"

ar_command pathCC
ar_options "-ar -o"

shared_flags "-fPIC"

<so_link_commands>
default -> "$(CXX) -shared -fPIC -Wl,-soname,{soname_abi}"
</so_link_commands>
